sb.dtl:
Buses will operate in both directions via 16th, Western, 15th, Rockwell, and 16th.

Allow extra travel time.

Buses are rerouted due to street repair work on 16th Street between 2400 West and 2457 West.

#3: NB via Michigan, Madison, State, Chicago to Michigan, nrml rt, SB via Chicago, State, Washington, nrml rt.
#4: NB via Michigan, Madison, ending at Madison/Wabash. SB begin at Madison/Wabash, operate via Madison, State, Monroe, nrml rt.
#6: NB via Columbus, Roosevelt, Michigan, Madison, ending at Madison/Wabash. SB begin at Madison/Wabash, operate via Madison, nrml rt.
#10: NB via State, Chicago to Michigan, nrml rt. SB via Michigan, Chicago, State to Wacker, nrml rt.
#J14: NB via Columbus, Roosevelt, Michigan to Balbo, nrml rt. SB via Michigan, Roosevelt, nrml rt.
#146: SB via Michigan, Chicago, State to Wacker, nrml rt. NB via State, Chicago, nrml rt.
#147: SB via Michigan, Chicago, State, Washington, nrml rt. NB via State, Chicago, nrml rt.
#151: SB via Michigan, Chicago, State, Washington, nrml rt. NB via Dearborn, Washington, State, Chicago, nrml rt.

Buses are rerouted due to the Magnificent Mile Chicago Women's Half-Marathon
and 5K.

The eastbound #N4 Cottage Grove, #19 United Center Express, #20 Madison, #56 Milwaukee
#60 Blue Island/26th,#N66 Chicago (Owl), #147 Outer Drive Express, #151 Sheridan,
#157 Streeterville/Taylor bus stop on the southeast corner at Washington/State will be temporarily relocated to the southwest corner at Washington/Wabash.


The bus stop will be temporarily relocated due to construction.

The eastbound #N4 Cottage Grove (owl), #19 United Center Express, #20 Madison
#56 Milwaukee, #60 Blue Island/26th, #N66 Chicago (owl), #147 Outer Drive Express
#151 Sheridan, #157 Streeterville/Taylorbus stop on the southeast corner at Washington/Wabash will be temporarily eliminated.

The bus stop will be temporarily eliminated due to construction.

Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express, #10 Museum of Science and Industry, and
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses will operate via Columbus and Roosevelt to Michigan.

#6 and #J14 buses will continue their normal route on Michigan.

#10 buses will resume their normal route on Balbo.

Southbound #6 and #10 buses will operate via Balbo, Michigan, and Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on Columbus.

Southbound #J14 buses will operate via Michigan and Roosevelt, then resume their normal route on Columbus.

Allow extra time.

Buses are rerouted due to the Magnificent Mile Chicago Women's Half-Marathon and 5K.

How does this affect my trip?
New #J14 Jeffery Jump and #15 Jeffery Local bus stops have been added on the northeast and southwest corners at Jeffery/81st.

Why is service being changed?
The bus stops have been added for customer convenience.

New #J14 and #15 bus stops have been added on the northeast and southwest corners at Jeffery/81st.

The bus stops have been added for customer convenience.

Effective Thursday, April 2 until further notice

#56 Milwaukee, #60 Blue Island/26th, #124 Navy Pier, and #157 Streeterville/Taylor
bus stop located on the northeast corner at Madison/Franklin will be relocated 1-1/2 blocks east, mid-block between LaSalle and Wells.

The bus stop will be temporarily relocated due to construction.

The westbound #19 United Center Express, #20 Madison, #60 Blue Island/26th, #124 Navy Pier, and #157 Streeterville/Taylor, and northbound J14 Jeffery Jump and #56 Milwaukee stop at the northwest corner of Madison/State will be temporarily relocated to the northeast corner of Madison/Wabash.
